= AltAnalyze Independent Tools (GUI) =

Simple and fast single use research tools available via the *Additional Analyses* menu:
 * [Heatmaps Expression Clustering]
 * [PCA Principal Component Analysis]
 * [GOElite  Gene-Set Enrichment Analysis]
 * [PathwayVisualizaton  Pathway Visualization]
 * [NetPerspective Network Analysis and Visualization]
 * [AltExonViewer Alternative Exon Visualization]
 * [LineageProfiler Sample Classification]
 * [VennAnalysis Venn Diagram Creation]
 * [TableComparison Table Merging]
 * [IdentifierTranslation ID System Translation]
